alert.note: Alert for Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:19AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN SCHUYLKILL COUNTY THROUGH 400 AM EDT... At 318 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Clair, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pottsville, Tamaqua, Schuylkill Haven, Shenandoah, Minersville, Mahanoy City, Frackville, St. Clair, Orwigsburg, Mcadoo, Port Carbon, Hometown, Tuscarora, New Philadelphia, Oneida, Friedensburg, Grier City-Park Crest, Marlin, Altamont and Renningers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
